name: zipcaptions
description: zip-captions is a self-hosted utility that collects and packages subtitle or caption files into zip archives for distribution or backup, often used alongside media automation workflows.
features: Subtitle collection: Gather subtitle and caption files from multiple sources into organized collections.
Archive creation: Package collected subtitles into zip files for easy distribution and backup.
Format support: Handle SRT, VTT, ASS, and other common subtitle formats with automatic detection.
Batch processing: Process multiple subtitle files simultaneously to create archives efficiently.
Metadata preservation: Maintain language codes, encoding information, and file structure in archives.
Web interface: Upload and manage subtitle files through a browser-based interface without command-line tools.
Automation integration: Connect with media automation workflows to archive subtitles alongside video downloads.
Language filtering: Select specific subtitle languages to include or exclude from archive creation.
Duplicate detection: Identify and skip duplicate subtitle files to keep archives clean and minimal.
Custom naming: Configure archive naming patterns based on media titles, dates, or custom templates.
Download management: Generate download links for created archives with optional expiration times.
Storage organization: Automatically organize subtitle archives by media type, date, or custom categories.
